value:
$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|We're back...and better than ever! We
won't lose...not again!$k$p$nMPID_双界アクア|They may have won a battle, but
they haven't won the war. Our
perseverance will ensure victory.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|A loss is a loss. But I'm not going
to waste a second chance at a win.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリカアラ,ch03_19_Karla_F_Hatari,Face|I've finally found my footing with this
lance. I won't make the same
mistakes twice.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|Y'all ready to feast your eyes on
some flashy techniques? I've got 'em
in spades!$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Hartari,Face|It's heartening to see you all so fired
up. This fighting spirit is what the
Hatari festival is all about!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE10_01,0|$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|What? No! This can't be happening!
How did they beat us?$k$pUgh. I guess our opponents are
stronger than we gave them
credit for.$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|I'm...sorry... I should have...sung
louder...$k$p$nMPID_双界アクア|It's not your fault, Leanne. We all
fought just as hard as our opponents.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Hartari,Face|Azura is right. You all pushed
your limits today. You should be
proud of yourselves.$k$pLook to the crowds. See their smiling
faces? We weren't the only ones
enjoying the tournament.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリカアラ,ch03_19_Karla_F_Hatari,Face|I suppose this lance did coax me out
of my comfort zone. Win or lose, I am
grateful for the experience.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|Yeah, come to think of it, this was
actually pretty fun. What's your take,
Mr. Mercenary?$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリディーン,ch10_33_Deen_M_Hatari,Face|If you're expecting some sort of
sappy "thank you," you have another
thing coming.$k$pBut...I won't lie: it's nice to battle
full-out without worrying about
getting killed.$k$pI bet I could put some of the things
I've learned today to good use. Next
time, I won't lose.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Hartari,Face|Next time, huh? Well, I'm glad to see
that my people's festival was just as
enthusiastically received in Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_リアーネ,ch05_07_Aqua_FF_Pair,Face|I'm going...to get stronger! Let's do
this again...next year!$k$p$nMPID_双界アクア|Yes. It may take further training and
time, but I have no doubt that future
victory is within our grasp.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリカアラ,ch03_19_Karla_F_Hatari,Face|There is yet more to discover on
the path of the lance. But I am
willing to learn.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリチェイニー,ch01_43_Cheney_M_Hatari,Face|Sheesh. Don't tell me I'm the only
one who'd rather be chowin' down
on concessions...$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Hartari,Face|This is how we laguz interact with
our world. To truly know someone,
you must lock horns with them.$k$pI am grateful to have gotten to know
you all better...and to have watched
you all grow.$k$p$Sbs150|
